product_name: Mountaineers Books Reinhold Messner: My Life at the Limit
long_description: A conversation between the legendary mountaineer and award-winning journalist Thomas Huetlin, Reinhold Messner: My Life at the Limit reveals much more of Messner than his climbing career.
short_description: A conversation between the legendary mountaineer and award-winning journalist Thomas Huetlin, Reinhold Messner: My Life at the Limit reveals much more of Messner than his climbing career.
